column5: Whats driving company specific returns todayNCLH CCL RCL On June 4 the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the United States Department of the Treasury removed the authorization for group peopletopeople educational travel by US persons to Cuba Concurrently the United States Department of Commerces Bureau of Industry and Security removed the authorization to travel for most noncommercial aircraft and all passenger and recreational vessels including cruise ships on temporary sojourn in Cuba Combined these rulings which took effect on June 5 effectively eliminate the ability of cruise lines to offer cruise travel to Cuba The extremely abbreviated time frame to modify itineraries to be in compliance with the new travel restrictions to Cuba will effect earnings estimatesNCHL estimates an impact to full year eps of 025 035
